content:
Cloudbased POS System

Easy to use, fully cloud based pos system with integration to the most common payment terminals. 100% integrated with the rest of the GetShop products.

Custom Views

Setup different views for you POS to make it more efficient. The view can be customized with different lists so that you can easily have a different menu at your fingertip.

Thermo Printers

We offer thermo printers that is integrated with the POS. If you have a GetShop thermo printer for receipts you will also be able to use the same printer from the PMS system.

Departments

By setting up multiple pos-systems you can connect them to your different departments. Later on you can segregate the incomes based on the different departments.
